title: API Endpoint Configuration
description: GET endpoint at /ts/pets/:id for retrieving individual pets by ID.

title: Path Parameter Validation
description: Zod schema validation for pet ID path parameter with proper error handling.

title: Pet Data Retrieval
description: Retrieves pet data from store using validated ID with null checking.

title: Error Handling
description: Comprehensive error handling for invalid IDs and not found cases.

title: Success Response
description: Returns pet data with 200 status code for successful retrieval.
